com.example.bot.spring

Class Recommendation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.bot.spring.Recommendation

  • public class Recommendation
extends java.lang.Object
    Recommendation class sorts the inputted menu according to the recommended calories for the particular user. It also has the feature of recommending only vegetarian dishes.
    Since:
    2017-11-20

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Recommendation(User user, Dish[] dishes) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void findRecommendation()
      This is a method to sort the input dishes according to calories in each dish around the required calories per day of the user and also filters out dishes which are against diet preferences.
      Dish[] getInputDishes() 
      Dish[] getRecommendedDishes() 
      Dish[] getVegRecommendedDishes()
      This method is to remove any dishes which are not vegetarian
      java.lang.String motivationMessage()
      This method is to call for motivational messages
